alert.note: Alert for Barton; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:05PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Crawford, northern Barton and Vernon Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 104 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nevada to near Arma. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prairie State Park, Nevada, Lamar, Frontenac, Liberal, Sheldon, Mulberry, Mindenmines, Montevallo, Arcadia, Walker, Schell City, Bronaugh, Lamar Heights, Moundville, Milo, Deerfield, Irwin, Burgess and Metz. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 67 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
